bibl.title: Bibliography on Early Christian and Medieval Egypt and Nubia.
bibl.note: Starting point: 2000. - Four sections: I. Archaeology and topography; - II. Texts - documents - linguistics; - III. History and theology; - IV. Discovery reports and bibliographies which include topics of Christian Egypt.

bibl.title: Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.seg: GROSSMANN Peter and Sofia SCHATEN (collected and annotated by), Bibliography on Early Christian and Medieval Egypt and Nubia.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 41 (2002) pp. 97-118.

Starting point: 2000. - Four sections: I. Archaeology and topography; - II. Texts - documents - linguistics; - III. History and theology; - IV. Discovery reports and bibliographies which include topics of Christian Egypt.
